history.proof: intros P Dec c. induction c. - left. intros d H. inversion H. - destruct IHc as [Hc | Hc]. ++ specialize (Dec c). destruct Dec as [Pc | nPc]. ** right. exists c. split. apply Nat.lt_succ_r. auto. auto. ** left. intros d Hd. apply Nat.lt_succ_r in Hd. sauto l: on depth: 3. ++ right. destruct Hc as [d [Hdc Pd]]. exists d. split. ** apply Nat.lt_le_trans with c; auto. ** auto.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet ---: Current bullet --- is not finished.
Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet --- is not finished.
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet **.

original: intros P Dec c. induction c. - left. intros d H. inversion H. - destruct IHc as [Hc | Hc]. ++ specialize (Dec c). destruct Dec as [Pc | nPc]. ** right. exists c. split. apply Nat.lt_succ_r. auto. auto. ** left. intros d Hd. apply Nat.lt_succ_r in Hd. destruct Hd as [Hdc | Hdc]. --- apply Hc in Hdc. auto. --- subst. auto. ++ right. destruct Hc as [d [Hdc Pd]]. exists d. split. ** apply Nat.lt_le_trans with c; auto. apply Nat.le_succ_l. auto. ** auto.
